CHAT.comment: RICHLIN SECURITY SERVICE COMPANY, Petitioner v. MICHAEL CHERTOFF, SECRETARY OF HOMELAND SECURITY.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:05 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BRIAN WOLFMAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ANTHONY YANG ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF BRIAN WOLFMAN, ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:06 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
